meanings.definition: The quality or state of having a smell or odor.
meanings.sent1: The odorousnesses of the flowers filled the room with a pleasant aroma.
meanings.sent2: The bakery's odorousnesses attracted customers from far and wide.
meanings.sent3: The odorousnesses of the garbage made the raccoons throw a party in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The odorousnesses of the perfume enveloped her in a cloud of sweetness.
meanings.sent5: The odorousnesses of the campfire lingered in the air long after the flames had died down.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of emitting a scent or fragrance.
meanings.sent1: The odorousnesses of the freshly baked bread made everyone's mouths water.
meanings.sent2: The odorousnesses of the pine trees perfumed the forest with a crisp scent.
meanings.sent3: The odorousnesses of the skunk spray sent everyone running in the opposite direction.
meanings.sent4: The odorousnesses of the roses in the garden whispered of love and romance.
meanings.sent5: The odorousnesses of the coffee brewing in the morning signaled the start of a new day.
